batch import Note:\nTo batch import, you need to put the picture file in this path.\n\n Path: /sdcard/offline/register/ \n File format: .jpg \n Name format:\n peter_12345678901_2020-04-09-12-10-00.jpg\n Note that the third parameter time is the validity time. OK This device is Activated with your Cloud account. Any changes to the settings locally will be overwritten upon next restart or sync. Please modify the appropriate settings online and sync the settings on the device. Note: You can modify locally to finalize what settings to apply for the device via online settings.
